personal.name: Firas Al Kharusi
personal.title: Full Stack Developer & IT Applications Specialist
personal.bio: Experienced Full Stack Developer with a proven track record in delivering enterprise-grade solutions. Currently leading IT application delivery at Vodafone Oman, I specialize in building scalable web and mobile applications using modern technologies. With expertise spanning from React and Node.js to Go and Python, I bring a comprehensive approach to software development. My journey from the University of Michigan to working with major corporations has equipped me with both technical excellence and strong project management skills.
personal.shortBio: Full Stack Developer specializing in modern web and mobile applications. Currently leading IT solutions delivery at Vodafone Oman.
